Articles.Content: When I go onto the map view sometimes the game randomly goes to Focus Kerbin and then I can't view my ship view, how do I get back to my rocket view? I know you can do it by swapping too another rocket then switching back but this way stops me being able to revert flight if somethings goes wrong.

When I go onto the map view sometimes the game randomly goes to Focus Kerbin and then I can't view my ship view, how do I get back to my rocket view? I know you can do it by swapping too another rocket then switching back but this way stops me being able to revert flight if somethings goes wrong.

Press backspace. That should center your view back to the craft, at least if you haven't fiddled with key bindings too much.
Thanks I don't know how to change my post to answered but you answered it alright
Is this still working? I press it and nothing happens

6 minutes ago, EstebanLB said:

Is this still working? I press it and nothing happens

Yes, still works.

20 minutes ago, EstebanLB said:

Is this still working? I press it and nothing happens

Yes, but they changed the default key to back quote (the ~ button to the left of the 1 key). They did that to avoid a conflict with the default key for the 'abort' action group, which is also backspace.
